title: stuck at reconnect
body: an aram game of mine just ended and my client was feeling buggy i restarted and now my client is sure that i'm in a game and i can't do anything but reconnect but there is NO game to reconnect to{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: If you're still in a game you should still be able to rejoin, unless it ended early for a remake or surrender.  We're investigating these ghost games issues currently as well.  Our network team put up an update on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, but you may need to wait a bit for the server to pick up the match and  leave the reconnect screen.  Hang tight!
